channel.title: Guildminer and banker
channel.description:
I suggest someone writes a guildminer and banker as they are good money makers.
If it is too difficult or takes too much time then he should make it a pay script and alot of people would want to use it. Nobody has written a good one since stupid3000's exquisite guildminer two years ago.
I mean if I could be making 2k coal a night again I would be ecstatic.
Details of this type script:
-would start script in east falador bank and go to guild mine by going down the ladder and mine a full load of coal and come back up ladder and bank it -would have random logout and login option -would have full antirandoms including pick finding -would have antiban procedures
See if you could try and write one man

@fuiop2000 wrote:

yes i admit it i have 500k and i would spend it on this

i think a mill is steep

but its up to madcow w/e he says goes…

item.title: Guildminer and banker
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

fuiop2000:

chances are your guildminer isnt as great as you think it is

Chances are that people will tell me what needs fixing and it will be flawless in a week.

I’d have to agree with inferno though rofl

Mad Cow

Read full topic

item.title: Guildminer and banker
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

fuiop2000:

or allow the first buyers within two weeks buy it at 500k and then you raise the price after that, even if it is perfect on release

You only increase if its improved… So if it’s perfect, why bother?

P.S: I don’t give discounts to naggers.

Mad Cow

Read full topic

item.title: Guildminer and banker
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

[quote=“Mad Cow, post:2, topic:9739”]I’m currently in the process of making one.

I’ve done
-Anti-Randoms(Including pick finding)
-Flawless Walking(Only 1 route so far but more coming)
-Flawless Ladder clicking(Skillfull technique ;))
-Perfect mining procedure(A modified one of Wizzups)

To do
-Auto colour finding
-Multiple routes(3+)
-Random Logout
-Forms
-Progress report(Easy)
-More bug fixing
-Ownage anti-ban

And yeh…

Unforunately this script will be for sale as it will be badly leeched if it was free(Like what Stupids was). Haven’t thought of a price but it will be 500k - 1M

It should be ready in 1 - 2 weeks,
Mad Cow[/quote]

Sweet job, Mad Cow.

Read full topic

item.title: Guildminer and banker
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

I’m currently in the process of making one.

I’ve done

-Flawless Walking(Only 1 route so far but more coming)
-Flawless Ladder clicking(Skillfull technique ;))

-Forms

-More bug fixing
-Ownage anti-ban

And yeh…

Unforunately this script will be for sale as it will be badly leeched if it was free(Like what Stupids was). Haven’t thought of a price but it will be 500k - 1M

It should be ready in 1 - 2 weeks,
Mad Cow
